name: analytics_specialist
description: Business intelligence and data analysis agent specialized in inventory analytics, trends, forecasting, and performance reporting. Provides actionable insights through statistical analysis and predictive modeling.

skills.name: get_inventory_trends
skills.description: Analyze inventory turnover trends and identify fast/slow moving products based on historical data

skills.name: calculate_inventory_value
skills.description: Calculate total inventory value with category-level breakdowns and top items by value

skills.name: generate_sales_forecast
skills.description: Generate sales forecasts and reorder point recommendations using EOQ models

skills.name: generate_performance_report
skills.description: Generate comprehensive performance reports with KPIs including fill rate, stockout count, and turnover metrics

skills.name: compare_categories
skills.description: Compare metrics between product categories including value, turnover, and stock levels

skills.name: detect_inventory_anomalies
skills.description: Detect statistical anomalies in inventory data using standard deviation analysis
